entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 14.
